author: Joel Balsam
title: Watch A Girl Basically Orgasm When She Meets Her Boyfriend's Mom
text:
YouTube Prankster's Girlfriend Accidentally Wears Vibrating Panties When She Meets His Mom © HammyTV / Getty Images YouTube Prankster's Girlfriend Accidentally Wears Vibrating Panties When She Meets His Mom Trending News: Watch A Girl Basically Orgasm When She Meets Her Boyfriend's Mom Shares Quick Take 
There's a long and storied history of women wearing vibrators in their panties and going out in public. You needn't look past this weekend for an example when a YouTuber went to Starbucks with a surprise for herself under her pants. But you can't say many of these women did it by accident. 
Related: The Best Sex Toys For Couples 
YouTube prankster Ryan Hamilton got his girlfriend a nifty pair of vibrating panties to wear, and just so happened to give it to her immediately before going for a drive with his mom. The girlfriend sports the panties at home and that's all well and good, but she forgets something — she forgets to take off the damn undies when she went out to the car. 
Watch her giggle and squirm — and almost cum — as her boyfriend relentlessly pushes the button on the remote control. 
Like a good prankster's mom — following in the footsteps of Tom Green and Bam Margera's parents — the mom handles it like a champ. She even takes hold of the button and sends her potential future daughter-in-law into a frenzy. Well done, mom. 
A job well done also goes to Hamilton, cause yeah, look at her. And to the girlfriend, who takes the whole thing in stride (quite literally by the end of it). 
But if you were to ask me, is this thing staged? I would say yes, it most probably is. Drop This Fact 
One of the vibrating panties on the market, the Booty Parlor , can be controlled from as far away as 20 to 30 feet. Show comments
